## Checklist

- [ ] No emojis in PR title/body or commit messages
- [ ] I synced from latest main and read `.local/INDEX.md`
- [ ] I updated the `.local` submodule pointer for this PR (if governance changed)
- [ ] I added a worklog entry in `.local/worklog/<name>.md` (datetime+tz+commit range)
- [ ] If first PR: I added `.local/ack/<name>.md`
- [ ] Description includes what changed / what did NOT change / bugs fixed / new behavior
